name: Futuristic Flying Monster Car Driving
description:
Futuristic Flying Monster Car Driving

Free to Play & Download on GOOGLE Play Store.

Welcome to biggest open world Flying Truck Simulator. In this crazy game you will be flying with a Monster truck.
If you are a fanatic fan of flying bus, dragons and muscle carriage driving games then download this free flying motor game today.
Take control, guide and steer the Monster truck through every way-points to be sure you arrive at the correct destination.
Feel like in the future. Manage flying Extreme monster truck. Many movies are our future and the people in it are flying on their machines in the air.
Be the best car driver! You are free in a city that you can do what you want.
So get set to show some extreme stunts to fly the lorry race in the newest combination of flying truck games.
AIRPLANE SIMULATOR GAME ON ANDROID. Fly virtual airplane everywhere you want with your phone for Free!

GAME FEATURES:

=> Test your Pickup Truck Driving Skills
=> Improve Airplane Flight Ability
=> Stunning HD Graphics
=> Easy and Free to use
